law.catch_line: Day treatment programs of Department of Juvenile Justice.
law.text: By August 1, 2000, the Department of Juvenile Justice shall provide, based on available general fund appropriations, a day treatment program accessible to every school district in each judicial region of the state. The day treatment programs shall combine therapeutic and academic services.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 493, sec. 8, effective April 10, 1998.
